member.name: ID2D1RenderInfo.SetCached
member.summary: Specifies that the output of the transform in which the render information is encapsulated is or is not cached.
member.param: TRUE if the output of the transform is cached; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: ID2D1RenderInfo.SetInputDescription
member.summary: Sets how a specific input to the transform should be handled by the renderer in terms of sampling.
member.param: The index of the input that will have the input description applied.
The description of the input to be applied to the transform.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1RenderInfo.SetInstructionCountHint
member.summary: Provides an estimated hint of shader execution cost to D2D.
member.param: An approximate instruction count of the associated shader.

member.name: ID2D1RenderInfo.SetOutputBuffer
member.summary: Allows a caller to control the output precision and channel-depth of the transform in which the render information is encapsulated.
member.param: The type of buffer that should be used as an output from this transform.
The number of channels that will be used on the output buffer.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1RenderInfo
member.summary: Describes the render information common to all of the various transform implementations.
